entry.def: If someone is described as a rightist, they are politically conservative and traditional. Rightists support the ideals of capitalism.
If someone has rightist views or takes part in rightist activities, they are politically conservative and traditional and support the ideas of capitalism.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a right wing political party
1. believing in or supporting tenets of the political right
